long_description: A top-of-the-line cross-country 29er, the Cannondale Scalpel 29er Alloy 3 full-suspension mountain bike uses a Lefty fork, a featherlight frame and great components to give you a competitive edge. Lefty 29er fork with Push-Button Rebound (PBR) offers 100mm of smooth, responsive travel and precise handling; easy-access lockout and rebound controls are glove-friendly. Very lightweight aluminum frame features a race-ready, agile design and plenty of stiffness for a responsive ride; super-stiff seatstays and chainstays minimize flex. Fox Performance CRD rear shock and optimized pivot design combine for a responsive and plush rear suspension system. Oversize 1.5 in. headtube enhances strength, rigidity and steering precision. SRAM S1400 crankset is paired with SRAM X7 shifters, SRAM X9 rear derailleur and SRAM X7 front derailleur to make up a 2x10 drivetrain with 20 gears. BB30 bottom bracket design increases stiffness for improved power-transfer. Magura MT2 hydraulic disc brakes supply easy speed management with a 180mm rotor up front, 160mm in the back. Stans ZTR Rapid rims are outfitted with fast-rolling and versatile Schwalbe Racing Ralph tires for confident trail handling and traction. Specs on the Cannondale Scalpel 29er Alloy 4 full-suspension mountain bike are subject to change.
